SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into REPORT (STUDENT_ID, STUDENT_NAME, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, CREDIT, REASON, PROOF) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proof,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update REPORT set STUDENT_ID = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STUDENT_NAME = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROOF = #{proof,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, STUDENT_ID, STUDENT_NAME, PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, CREDIT, REASON, PROOF from REPORT
